edu.uw.spl.broker

Class BrokerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.broker.BrokerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.Broker, edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.ExchangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class BrokerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.Broker, edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.ExchangeListener
    Implementation of the Broker interface. Interacts with the AccountManager to create Accounts, get/set Accounts, delete Accounts, or process Orders on behalf of an Account
    Author:
    slajaunie

        Constructor- Instantiates a new Broker implementation
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Broker
        acctMgr - the AccountManager instance that will be associated with this broker
        exchange - The exchange this broker will interact with

      • close

        public void close()
           throws edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException
        Attempts to close resources being used by this broker. If unable to close due to an AccountException, will throw a BrokerException
        Specified by:
        close in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.Broker
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException - if unable to close resources, or receives an exception
        See Also:
        Broker.close()

      • createAccount

        public edu.uw.ext.framework.account.Account createAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                                          java.lang.String password,
                                                          int balance)
                                                   throws edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException
        Creates a new account utilizing the AccountManager. If the AccountManager throws an AccountException will throw a BrokerException and return null
        Specified by:
        createAccount in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.Broker
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the account
        password - the password of the account
        balance - the initial balance of the account.
        Returns:
        account the newly created account, or null if an exception is thrown
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException - if there was a problem creating the account
        See Also:
        Broker.createAccount(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)

                                                       java.lang.String password)
                                                throws edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException
        Look up an account based on the given account name and password, and returns that account, or null if the account was not located in the directory, or the provided password is incorrect
        Specified by:
        getAccount in interface edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.Broker
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the account to retrieve
        password - the password of the account to retrieve
        Returns:
        the account associated with the given account name, or null if the account was not located in the directory or the provided password was incorrect
        Throws:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.BrokerException - if the operation failed
